mention.text: the Federal Migration Service Konstantin Romodanovsky
Russian-speaking compatriots , if these people or their ascendants live permanently or lived earlier in Russia
The key provision of the law endorsed by the upper house
introduction of an institute of recognition of foreign citizens or stateless people as Russian speakers
